item.title: Ripple’s XRP breaks $3 for first time since 2018, nears all-time high
item.description: XRP surged 12% on speculation that Trump’s administration will support Ripple and the crypto industry.

item.title: TikTok influencers resist a move to Meta under the app’s looming ban. ‘The vibes are not the same’
item.description: There’s some apprehension about audience-building and monetization options on Meta.

item.title: UnitedHealth CEO calls out pharmaceutical companies for inflating prices in first earnings call since executive was murdered
item.description: Revenue grew to over $400 billion, but still missed growth targets.

item.title: XRP and Solana ETPs could rake in as much as $14 billion, JPMorgan says
item.description: The banking giant projects each ETP could bring in $3 billion to $8 billion in investment.

item.title: UnitedHealth CEO admits 3 major issues with the health system in first public comments since executive’s murder
item.description: Andrew Witty—who also said that 'the health system needs to function better'— made his comments during an earnings call reporting $14 billion in 2024 ...
